1417520.name: Jumbo: Jewel of Realms
1417520.description:
Welcome to Jumbo: Jewel of Realms, an action-platformer adventure! Embark on a quest from Bloom Town that would take you against countless of formidable foes – interact with a variety of unique characters with their own stories and discover the secrets of the Jewel of Realms. Jumbo: Jewel of Realms includes all past content updates, including "Foundation", "Iceheart", "Pets" and "Realms" expansion updates alongside remastered visuals and much more.

VAST OPEN WORLD

Discover the worlds of Blooming Valley, Icepoint and The Realm as you explore an expansive open world, interact with characters to learn their stories - some may help you along the way!

INTUITIVE COMBAT AND MOVEMENT

Bounce around and wreak havoc against any threats that stand in your way using Jumbo's extraordinary abilities. Watch out for any dangers!

COLLECT COINS

Gather coins as a currency scattered around the world to spend on traders seeking their fortune! Spend it on new Outfits, Pets, and more.

ADOPT PETS

Visit the Pets Emporium to adopt your very-own Pet, which will follow you during your adventure and keep you company!


How far will you go to save Bloom Town?

*INCLUDES FOUNDATION UPDATE, ICEHEART EXPANSION, PETS EXPANSION, REALMS EXPANSION AND MUCH MORE!
1417520.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
